title: A Conservative Loss Recovery Algorithm Based on Selective Acknowledgment (SACK) for TCP
abstract:
This document presents a conservative loss recovery algorithm for TCP
that is based on the use of the selective acknowledgment (SACK) TCP option.  The
algorithm presented in this document conforms to the spirit of the current
congestion control specification (RFC 5681), but allows TCP senders to recover
more effectively when multiple segments are lost from a single flight of data.
This document obsoletes RFC 3517 and describes changes from it.
